DESCRIPTION: #ySummoning an #yUndead creates a Minion to aid you in battle. When maximum minions is reached #ySummoning will cause minions of the same type will form a Hoard.
#yUndead, Weak and fragile minions capable of taking blows for you and dealing damage NL HP - #b6 NL Pow - #b4 NL Block - #b4
Syphon damage restores HP equal to the power of the attack.

#ySouls are gathered by slaying non-Minion enemies and Grant #b3 additional Max HP while stored are used for many powerful effects the Soulbinders Lichdom permits, including resurrecting on the spot Healing to half your max HP.
